derivation: from H1097 (בְּלִי) and H3276 (יַעַל);(often in connection with H376 (אִישׁ), H802 (אִשָּׁה), H1121 (בֵּן), etc.)
outline:
1. worthlessness
    1. worthless, good for nothing, unprofitable, base fellow
    2. wicked
    3. ruin, destruction (construct)
strongs_def: without profit, worthlessness; by extension, destruction, wickedness
